title: Senior Software Developer (Manager)

title: TypeScript Developer
description: Urgently need TypeScript devs for my workplace. Company is based in Australia with worldwide clients. Pay is per hour - experienced devs can start at 25 USD or AUD equivalent, less for junior devs (to be discussed with management). Good work-life balance with minimal meetings (daily standup and biweekly reviews). Flexible timezone arrangements available. You'll work under me as the tech lead. Interview process: 30min technical interview + 30min management interview. Projects involve full-stack TypeScript work with AWS infrastructure (CDK/CloudFormation experience is a plus). Longer job description coming soon. Contact: vidur.butalia@lewinnovation.com or me@vidur.dev

title: NLP Research Engineer, Vision Research Engineer
description: Hey guys, currently working @Predii. We are hiring for few roles -  1. NLP Research Engineer  2. Vision Research Engineer. What do we do? Most of us have gone through the experience of  taking our car in service. However, we donâ€™t really think about whatâ€™s going on in backend, everything it takes to be able to diagnose the problem - finding the right parts, performing the correct repair and get it done in a matter of hours so you can get your car back asap. In fact, the dealerships & repair shops have to accomplish this at a time when the number of experienced technicians is declining, interestingly only a third of them are over the age of 55 and the vehicles themselves are becoming more and more complex. This is where we come in - in fancy terms - we are taking the charge, applying AI to such challenges faced in the Automotive service & repair industry. More details on the LinkedIn post, JD link is also given here: https://www.linkedin.com/posts/predii_ai-automotive-llm-activity-7248577487234875392-PqRo?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_ios

title: React Developer
description: Came across a very interesting project brief today; while I would have loved to work on this myself, I can't - so sharing here in case someone is interested to work with them: Project Brief: React Developer for Interactive Museum Touchscreen Experience Project Overview: We are seeking an experienced React developer to build a dynamic, interactive touchscreen experience for a museum installation in Bhutan. The project is a locally-run, React-based web app designed to educate and engage visitors by bringing Bhutan's history to life through five central characters. Contact Information: If you are interested and available to start immediately, please reach out to us with your portfolio and availability: * Udita: udita[at]bongwaterfilms[dot]com * Siddharth: siddharth[at]bongwaterfilms[dot]com
